text: The 1983 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament was played in Normal, Illinois after the conclusion of the 1982–1983 regular season. The won their first MVC Tournament title to earn an automatic bid to the 1983 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Category:1982–83 Missouri Valley Conference men's basketball season Category:Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1983 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
